mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO userNo , USER_ID userId , USER_PWD userPwd , USER_NAME userName , EMAIL , ENROLL_DATE enrollDate , MODIFY_DATE modifyDate , STATUS FROM KH_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE KH_MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd} AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE KH_MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ${updatePwd} , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT DECODE( COUNT(*) , 0 , 'NNNNY' , 1 , 'NNNNN' ) FROM KH_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
